scripts.dev: source .env && forge create --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY src/ProjectFactory.sol:ProjectFactory --json > contractInfo.json
scripts.deploy-mantle-test: source .env && forge create --rpc-url https://rpc.testnet.mantle.xyz --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY src/ProjectFactory.sol:ProjectFactory --verify --verifier-url https://explorer.testnet.mantle.xyz/api --legacy --json > contractInfo.json
